title: New Champion design! Alipo - The Last Harmony
body:
New champion: Alipo - The last Harmony

PASSIVE: The Summoner of all: The next Summoner Spell you use doubles the effect. ({{summoner:12}} : can be teleported anywhere, without minions, towers or wards. ({{summoner:4}} : doubles the length) ({{summoner:14}} : Ignite doubles the DPS) ({{summoner:21}} : Doubles the amount of barrier) ({{summoner:7}} : If there is less then 2 or 2 people around you, they will be healed for 2x the amount of a normal heal. If there is 3 or more people around you, (Up to 4 people) They will all be healed.) ({{summoner:1}} : Unable to be effected by any CC for 6 Seconds) ({{summoner:6}} : Doubles the speed of ghost) ({{summoner:11}} : Doubles the damage of smite) ({{summoner:32}} : Doubles the length and width) ({{summoner:3}} : target enemy champion, reducing their Movement Speed and Attack Speed by 60%, their Armor and Magic Resist by 20, and their damage dealt by 80% for 5 seconds.)  (Cool-down: 1 time use) Passive: Gives Alipo 10 AP per level.

Q- Music from the soul: slow the enemy it hits by 10/15/20/25/30% also dealing 60/70/80/90/100 damage each level. If an Ally auto-attacks the enemy that has been recently hit by "Music from the soul", then the next auto attack will do 30/40/50/60/70 more damage. (10/9/8/7/6 Seconds cool down)

W- Passive: Tempo Dance: Auto-attack will give you and your allies hp by 10/15/20/25/30 per level. 10/9.5/9/8.5/8 Seconds cooldown 
Active: Music from the mind: Alipo is able to hear the movement of enemies. Running towards them will give you 10% extra 5/10/15/20/25% movement speed for 5 seconds. 20 seconds cooldown

E- Toggle: Music from the heart: Enemies around Alipo will damaged every 8 seconds. Dealing 20/25/30/40/50 damage. When Music from the heart is on, Alipo moves slower by 100/90/80/70/60 movement speed.

R- Music from the body: Every enemy around Alipo will walk slowly towards him for 2.5 seconds, unable to use any spells, summoners spells or items. (Charmed) 
90/80/70 seconds cool down

Lore: When Sona was born, she was separated from her true brother, Alipo. Alipo was thrown into the junkyard because Sona's family could not afford to keep him. When Alipo was 2 years old, he found a guitar in the junkyard. His childhood was this guitar. He would play it everywhere he goes, until one day, he was performing in the streets until a woman named Jane Buvelle saw him doing his best song. She asked where he lived and decided to adopt him.  He was then bought to a palace where Sona lived. Buvelle however told that Alipo could not talk to Sona, as most of the times she would be practising her ethwal. She also told Sona that she could not talk to him. Because when Sona is not practising, Alipo would be practising. The day when Sona decided to join the league of legends was the day when Alipo found out that his Guitar could heal those around him and hurt those around him. Sona left the palace so the only people left are Buvelle and Alipo. One day, a group of noxian bandits invaded the palace. They want nothing more then valuble treasure and wanted nothing more then that. However, on the way to Alipo's room, they pushed his guitar off his table. The guitar was broked into 2 pieces. As the guitar fell on the floor, Alipo's head started to hurt. He then collapsed on the floor. Buvelle was shocked, not only did Alipo fainted but her palaced was robbed. She saw the guitar that Alipo had was in 2 pieces, which meant that someone must have came in to her palace. She ran do the nearest carpenter, but they said that they were not able to fix the guitar, Buvelle thought that this is the end of Alipo, as he was no longer breathing. She placed the guitar into Alipo's hand and began to cry on his bed. The guitar suddenly started mending its self! Alipo's chest was glowing bright yellow! The guitar then was fixed, but left a crack scar on the front. Alipo also woke up, but there was a scar on the right side of his face. Buvelle was very excited and told Alipo that he must go and find Sona. (THE REST IS STILL WORK IN PROGRESS)
